text: Hugh "Hughie" Morrow (9 July 1930 - 27 October 2020) was a Northern Irish footballer and manager. He played in the Football League for West Bromwich Albion and Northampton Town, and in non-league football for Nuneaton Borough, Lockheed Leamington and Kettering Town. He was born in Larne, Northern Ireland. Morrow died on 27th October 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1930 births Category:Northern Irish footballers Category:Northern Irish football managers Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Hugh Morrow (footballer)
